billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

title: Authorizes a real property tax exemption for active duty reservists
summary: Authorizes a real property tax exemption for active duty reservists upon adoption of a local law, ordinance or resolution providing therefor; requires property of such active duty reservists to be his or her primary residence and such active duty reservist must have retained his or her active duty status for at least 90 consecutive days to claim such tax exemption; defines "eligible  reservist".
currentCommittee: VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to tax exemptions for eligible reservists
